page.title: 15A Domesday Survey.
page.content: On an estate near our school are two stores.These are B&Q,a "D.I.Y" store and M.F.I.,a fruniture store.They are about 4 miles from Birkenhead but are close to Bidston Station and the M53 motorway. On Fri. June 28th. we went to find out why people want to shop there.We decided that it would help the survey if we interviewed the store managers. Before the visit we divided into four groups;two to interview the managers, the others,the customers.We drew up a list of suitable questions. These are some of them. _______________________ MANAGER'S QUESTIONS (B&Q) _________________________ 1.What does B&Q stand for? 2.Why did you paint the store black, white and red? 3.Average no.of customers per day.
